Telling the husband he would even get them "mixed" up back then as well and then she asks him if she should play twin 1 again. To me this also hints at that before they were married they would "switch" places and share everything but after twin 1 got married she didn't want to do it anymore. It could very well be that all the rest you mentioned is true as well. But twin 2 also say's she's the one behind all of this and seemingly did it willingly which also hints at twin 2 loving the husband but after twin 1 didn't want to share him anymore she decided to take drastic measures to force them back into the switching/sharing status they used to have back in the days. The explanation by GuiltyIncest is wrong, the plot is surprisingly more complex than that. Heres a full explanation to anyone who read this shit in 2020+. MC is married to Twin #1. Twin #2 is jealous of this because she could never get a boyfriend since the gangster (guy who later cucks MC) had blackmail over her. The gangster never let Twin #2 have a boyfriend because he wanted to have pussy on hand. Due to this, Twin #2 fell into a spiral of deep jealousy and convinced herself that it is unfair for Twin #1 to have a happy love life while she is constantly being held down by the gangster. Although we never see it, Twin #2 setup Twin #1 to get raped by the gangster so Twin #1 could be the replacement pussy. Of course, since Twin #1 is a stupid hentai bitch, she eventually falls in love with the taste of the gangster's dick, and agrees to share the burden of pleasing the gangster with Twin #2, and also agrees to share the love of the husband.
